Detailed Description

template<class BULK>
class SwitchedModel< BULK >

Helper class for models whose animations can only switch their bulk.

template<class BULK>
virtual bool SwitchedModel< BULK >::valid (  )  const [inline, virtual]

This function returns true if the Model is in a valid state.

This function will not raise a critical error or asserts if called but may commit ERROR_MSGs to the log.

Returns:
Returns true if the animation is in a valid state, otherwise false.

Reimplemented from Model.
